capabilities.name: get-page
capabilities.description: Returns the standard page object for a wiki page, optionally including page source or rendered HTML, and including the license and information about the latest revision.

capabilities.name: get-page-history
capabilities.description: Returns information about the latest revisions to a wiki page, in segments of 20 revisions, starting with the latest revision. The response includes API routes for the next oldest, next newest, and latest revision segments.

capabilities.name: search-page
capabilities.description: Search wiki page titles and contents for the provided search terms, and returns matching pages.

capabilities.name: set-wiki
capabilities.description: Set the wiki to use for the current session.

capabilities.name: update-page
capabilities.description: Updates a wiki page. Replaces the existing content of a page with the provided content

capabilities.name: get-file
capabilities.description: Returns information about a file, including links to download the file in thumbnail, preview, and original formats.

capabilities.name: create-page
capabilities.description: Creates a wiki page with the provided content.
